s.text: Nevertheless, the article concludes, if the strikes don't stop the atrocities in Kosovo within a "few days," ground troops should be sent in.
First the roar of tanks coming down the valleys, then the sound of whistles being blown and the firing of automatic weapons, as the villages and hamlets that dot southern Kosovo ...

Nevertheless, commenting on the ship movements, Yeltsin's defense minister ominously said, "The Defense Ministry is also considering more decisive actions that will be recommended to the leadership if the situation changes."
